1588376339_1ErPX9yuZjokdcxUGavdRYRhwynA4.body: Guns are absolutely necessary for citizens to own. Especially guns that allow them to defend themselves against government dictates. No matter what horrifying things happen, nothing is more horrifying than the government having more firepower than it's citizens because that is exactly what allows them to force you to do things you don't want to do.

Sorry for the multiple posts but this is something I feel very passionate about and I don't think any discussion of gun control is complete without remembering that both Canadian and US governments are presently training their militaries to impose martial law.
Would be nice to have a gun if they try to arrest you for going outside: https://twitter.com/chicagosmayor/status/1256761226811650048
